short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring your company knowledge into the workflow of your people.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring Confluence & Sharepoint knowledge into your workflow. This extension brings the information from your company Confluence and Sharepoint to you when you are browsing. Bring your company knowledge into the workflow of your people.
